techmeme.title: In a peer-reviewed Nature article, DeepSeek says it has spent $294,000 on training its R1 model and used 512 Nvidia H800 chips (Eduardo Baptista/Reuters)
Nothing launches Ear 3, with a Super Mic system activated by a Talk button on the case, available on September 25 for $179 (Dominic Preston/The Verge)
A look at Live Translation on AirPods Pro, one of the strongest examples yet of how AI can be used in a seamless, practical way to improve people's lives (Brian X. Chen/New York Times)
Shein launches Xcelerator, a service granting fashion brands access to its fast-fashion manufacturing network in China (Bloomberg)
Niamh Sweeney, Facebook's former head of public policy in Ireland, is appointed as Ireland's new Data Protection Commissioner, starting October 13 (Peter Flanagan/The Irish Times)
